snippet: Paul Stanley of Kiss wants to shout it out loud: The band is miffed at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame for not inducting members Eric Singer and Tommy Thayer along with the original lineup....

headline.print_headline: Paul Stanley: Kiss Miffed at Rock Hall Over Snub
headline.main: Paul Stanley: Kiss Miffed at Rock Hall Over Snub

lead_paragraph: Paul Stanley of Kiss wants to shout it out loud: The band is miffed at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame for not inducting members Eric Singer and Tommy Thayer along with the original lineup.
